title.rendered: Vacancies at Rising Star International Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024

content.rendered:
A job advertisement in the Daily Express newspaper of 19 August 2024 announces vacancies at Rising Star International Trade Test & Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi, Abu Dhabi UAE. Having a primary, matric, middle, or high school education is preferred.

The latest Overseas Labor jobs at Rising Star International Trade Test & Technical Training Center can be applied for until October 19, 2024, or as per the closing date in the newspaper advertisement. Check out the complete ad online to learn how to apply for the latest job openings at Rising Star International Trade Test & Technical Training Center. There may be free accommodation, medical care, and transportation available.

Vacancies at Rising Star International Trade Test & Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024

Date Posted: 19 August 2024
Last Date: as per paper ad
Sector: Overseas
Newspaper: Express Jobs
Education: Primary | Middle | MatricVacancy
Location: UAE
Organization: Center for International Trade Tests & Technical Training Rising Star
Job Industry: Labor Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Qatar Jobs 2024 New Brand Manpower Management
  • Latest Private Company Peshawar Classified Jobs August 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024
  • Job at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School and College in 2024
  • Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement

Latest Private Jobs in UAE August 2024. Private Company Job only for UAE. Full-time jobs in UAE as a private company Rising Star International Trade Test & Technical Training Center. This ad was shared by Express Jobs. Required Education for this private company is Primary | Middle | MatricVacancy. Minimum Salary starts from 60000 Rs to 80000 Rs Per Month. For More Information please visit the photo ad & visit the official website of the Private Company Rising Star International Trade Test & Technical Training Center in September 2024.

How to Apply

Please follow the instructions in the job advertisement. Please login to view further details on how to apply online via https://www.jobz.pk. Beware of fraudulent recruiting activities. If an employer asks for money for any reason, do not pay and contact us.
